verses.verse: And they took their <S%H5265>journey<s%> from <S%H362>Elim,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> of <S%H5512>Sin,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H362>Elim<s%> and <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> on the <S%H2568>fifteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8145>second<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> after their <S%H3318>departing<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3885>murmured<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness:<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4310>Would<s%> <S%H5414><s%> to God we had <S%H4191>died<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> when we <S%H3427>sat<s%> by the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H5518>pots,<s%> and when we did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7648>full;<s%> for you have <S%H3318>brought<s%> us <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H854>whole<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> with <S%H7457>hunger.<s%>

Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H2005>Behold,<s%> I will <S%H4305>rain<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%> for you; and the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out and <S%H3950>gather<s%> a <S%H1697>certain<s%> <S%H1697>rate<s%> every <S%H3117>day,<s%> that I may <S%H5254>prove<s%> them, whether they will <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H8451>law,<s%> or <S%H3808>no.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they shall <S%H3559>prepare<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H935>bring<s%> in; and it shall be <S%H4932>twice<s%> as <S%H834>much<s%> as they <S%H3950>gather<s%> <S%H3117>daily.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> At <S%H6153>even,<s%> then you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%>

And in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> then you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for that he <S%H8085>hears<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> and <S%H4100>what<s%> are we, that you <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> us?

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> This shall be, when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H5414>give<s%> you in the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H7646>full;<s%> for that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H3885>murmur<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> him: and <S%H4100>what<s%> are we? your <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> are not <S%H5921>against<s%> us, but <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>Say<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7126>Come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> for he has <S%H8085>heard<s%> your <S%H8519>murmurings.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, as <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that they <S%H6437>looked<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> in the <S%H6051>cloud.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H8519>murmurings<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to them, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H996>At<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>flesh,<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> you shall be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H3899>bread;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that at <S%H6153>even<s%> the <S%H7958>quails<s%> <S%H5927>came<s%> up, and <S%H3680>covered<s%> the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> and in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H7902>lay<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H4264>host.<s%>

And when the <S%H2919>dew<s%> that <S%H7902>lay<s%> was <S%H5927>gone<s%> up, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> there lay a <S%H1851>small<s%> <S%H2636>round<s%> thing, as <S%H1851>small<s%> as the <S%H3713>hoar<s%> <S%H3713>frost<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, they <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H251>another,<s%> It is <S%H4478>manna:<s%> for they <S%H3045>knew<s%> not <S%H4100>what<s%> it was. And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H1931>This<s%> is the <S%H3899>bread<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you to <S%H402>eat.<s%>

<S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> <S%H3950>Gather<s%> of it every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating,<s%> an <S%H6016>omer<s%> for every <S%H1538>man,<s%> according to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of your <S%H5315>persons;<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> you every <S%H376>man<s%> for them <S%H834>which<s%> are in his <S%H168>tents.<s%>
And the children of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>so,<s%> and <S%H3950>gathered,<s%> some <S%H7227>more,<s%> some <S%H4591>less.<s%>

And when they did <S%H4058>mete<s%> it with an <S%H6016>omer,<s%> he that gathered <S%H7235>much<s%> had <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H5736>over,<s%> and he that gathered <S%H4591>little<s%> had <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2637>lack;<s%> they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3498>leave<s%> of it <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

Notwithstanding they <S%H8085>listened<s%> not to <S%H4872>Moses;<s%> but <S%H582>some<s%> of them <S%H3498>left<s%> of it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and it <S%H7311>bred<s%> <S%H8438>worms,<s%> and <S%H887>stank:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> with them.

And they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> it every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H6310>according<s%> to his <S%H400>eating:<s%> and when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> waxed <S%H2552>hot,<s%> it <S%H4549>melted.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> they <S%H3950>gathered<s%> <S%H4932>twice<s%> as much <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6016>omers<s%> for <S%H259>one<s%> man: and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5387>rulers<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H1931>This<s%> is that <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H1696>said,<s%> To <S%H4279>morrow<s%> is the <S%H7677>rest<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> <S%H644>bake<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> you will <S%H644>bake<s%> to day, and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> that you will <S%H1310>seethe;<s%> and that which <S%H5736>remains<s%> <S%H5736>over<s%> <S%H5117>lay<s%> up for you to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

And they <S%H5117>laid<s%> it up <S%H5704>till<s%> the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> as <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>bade:<s%> and it did not <S%H887>stink,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> was there any <S%H7415>worm<s%> therein.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H398>Eat<s%> that to <S%H3117>day;<s%> for to <S%H3117>day<s%> is a <S%H7676>sabbath<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%> to <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall not <S%H4672>find<s%> it in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>
<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H3950>gather<s%> it; but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> which is the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> in it there shall be <S%H3808>none.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> to pass, that there <S%H3318>went<s%> out some of the <S%H5971>people<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> for to <S%H3950>gather,<s%> and they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H3808>none.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H5704>How<s%> <S%H5704>long<s%> <S%H3985>refuse<s%> you to <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and my <S%H8451>laws?<s%>

<S%H7200>See,<s%> for that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you the <S%H7676>sabbath,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> he <S%H5414>gives<s%> you on the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of two <S%H3117>days;<s%> <S%H3427>abide<s%> you every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H8478>place,<s%> let <S%H408>no<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> out of his <S%H4725>place<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>
So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7673>rested<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> thereof <S%H4478>Manna:<s%> and it was like <S%H1407>coriander<s%> <S%H2233>seed,<s%> <S%H3836>white;<s%> and the <S%H2940>taste<s%> of it was like <S%H6838>wafers<s%> made with <S%H1706>honey.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commands,<s%> <S%H4393>Fill<s%> an <S%H6016>omer<s%> of it to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> for your <S%H1755>generations;<s%> that they may <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H398>fed<s%> you in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> when I <S%H3318>brought<s%> you <S%H3318>forth<s%> from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3947>Take<s%> a <S%H6803>pot,<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> an <S%H6016>omer<s%> <S%H4393>full<s%> of <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H8033>therein,<s%> and <S%H3240>lay<s%> it up <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept<s%> for your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>
As the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> so <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H3240>laid<s%> it up <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5715>Testimony,<s%> to be <S%H4931>kept.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4478>manna<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited;<s%> they did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4478>manna,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> they <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H7097>borders<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%>
Now an <S%H6016>omer<s%> is the <S%H6224>tenth<s%> part of an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>
